title: (x) Font on buttons in Mac OSX - Lucida Grande {Gordon J}
content:
Hi everyone!

I'm designing an Apple skin for the M3 Nintendo DS-card, and I need to know what font Apple uses for buttons in Mac OSX. I don't know whether it's the same font as used in title-bars etc. in Mac OSX, but I just need the one from the buttons ;).

In case someone's reading this thread and doesn't have a Mac, here's a screenshot: [http://www.robinkanters.nl/macosx-buttons.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015132020/http:/www.robinkanters.nl/macosx-buttons.png "http://www.robinkanters.nl/macosx-buttons.png")

Thanks in advance!  
Robin Kanters
author: Robbinski12
